name: Goblin Philosopher
description:
Created for Ludum Dare 48

Theme "Deeper and Deeper"

Guide goblins into deeper and deeper (for goblins) discussion as you propagate your goblin philosophy through the goblin warren.

--CONTROLS--

Click and drag to pick up and move goblins and to progress discussions.

Scroll at top and bottom edge of the screen.

Escape to pause.
